0.title: Dafi soap stick deodorant sport cooling model:
0.description:
• Deodorant with long lasting and favorite scent, suitable for use by women and men
  • It has a hydra-dry system that hydrates the lower layers and keeps the skin dry
  • Cooling with long-lasting freshness
  • It has a special formulation without aluminum, containing antioxidants and aloe vera extract

1.title: Dafi soap stick deodorant suitable for black and white clothes:
1.description:
• Deodorant with long lasting and favorite scent, suitable for use by women and men
  • It has a hydra-dry system that hydrates the lower layers and keeps the skin dry
  • Preventing white spots on black clothes and yellow spots on white clothes
  • It has a special formulation without aluminum, containing antioxidants and aloe vera extract, suitable for all skin types, especially sensitive skin
